changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE CUSTOMERS( CUSTOMERID varchar2(10) NOT NULL, NICKNAME varchar2(100) NOT NULL, FIRSTNAME varchar2(100) NOT NULL, LASTNAME varchar2(100) NOT NULL, BIRTHDATE DATE, EMAIL varchar2(100 char) NOT NULL, COUNTRYCODE varchar2(100 char), CITY varchar2(100 char), REGDATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREDENTIALID varchar2(10) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT UC_EMAIL UNIQUE (EMAIL), CONSTRAINT PK_CUSTOMERS PRIMARY KEY (CUSTOMERID) );

CREATE TABLE CREDENTIALS( CREDENTIALID varchar2(10) NOT NULL, PASSWORD varchar2(100) NOT NULL, TOKEN varchar2(40) NOT NULL, ROLE varchar2(100) NOT NULL, EXPIRYTS TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT PK_CREDENTIALS PRIMARY KEY (CREDENTIALID) );
